Name: Four-Knight
About the game: Four-Knight is a simple and strategic four-in-a-row. Rules Four-Knight is a simple four-in-a-row. The first player to get 4 knights in a row wins. However, Knights can be placed in a location moved from another knights. Act strategically on the simple rules and aim for your victory. 2~4 Player Local Multiplayer .2~4 player matches including the enemy are available. Aim for your victory in local multiplayer. Full Controller Support .Mouse/keyboard and controller support. It is also possible to play up to 4 players with a single mouse/keyboard or controller.
